sourcesContent:
export const dataview = {
    textStyle: {
        flex: 1,
        backgroundColor: '#fff', // Customize as needed
        color: '#000', // Customize as needed
        fontSize: 16,
        paddingHorizontal: 10, // Customize as needed
        paddingVertical: 8, // Customize as needed
        borderRadius: 8, // 
        shadowColor: '#ccc',
        shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 3 },
        shadowOpacity: 0.2,
        shadowRadius: 4,
        elevation: 2,
    },
    container: {
        display: "flex",
        flex:1,
        flexDirection: 'column',
        alignItems: 'center',
        backgroundColor: '#fff', // Customize as needed
        borderRadius: 8, // Customize as needed
        padding: 8,
        borderWidth: 1, // Customize as needed
        borderColor: '#ccc', // Customize as needed
    },
    text: {
        fontSize: 2,
        fontWeight: "bold",
        backgroundColor: "black"
    },
    input: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        alignItems: 'center',
        backgroundColor: '#fff', // Customize as needed
        borderRadius: 8, // Customize as needed
        paddingHorizontal: 8,
        borderWidth: 1, // Customize as needed
        borderColor: '#ccc',
    }
};
